hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Who's calling? nexium fda approval date Recently, an 88-year old man (Mr. Delbert Belton) in Spokane, Wash. was brutally murdered by two black teenagers. Apparently, Mr. Belton (a white man) was simply going to a local pool hall to spend time with friends. I certainly hope that the American media (including The Day) reports on this case with the exact same ferocity as it did the Trayvon Martin case. Otherwise, I would be left to think that the media believes that racial crimes can only be committed by white persons, or that the barbaric murder of an 88-year old veteran of WWII and the Battle of Okinawa is insignificant and not newsworthy to the extent of Martin/George Zimmerman.
